website_summaries.verdict: At a budget-friendly price, this long-lasting mascara delivers unbelievable volume and has an easy-to-use wand.
pros: Wand easily separates lashes to prevent clumping and is conveniently curved
One tube has a long lifespan, up to 3 months worth of use
Reliable – won't flake throughout the day
Conveniently sold by Amazon as a 2-pack
cons: After extended use, eyelash curl will begin to decrease

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened but container mascara comes in has changed and item defective. Received item without internal piece that scraps off excess mascara so it’s impossible to use. Requested a new bottle and was happy to see i didn’t have to send the old one back so no extra work for me. Now I receive the new one and it has the exact same issue!!! Now the only way to get my money back is to send product back and then I need to pay for label and shipping container so it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaEcho

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for price. Can be clumpy but doesn't flake. Let 1st coat dry for about 60 sec before adding second coat so lashes can thicken. I have thin lashes, so wanted something that helped w length and thickness at same time. 3rd coat will be too clumpy so stick w just 2. (1 coat = about 10 strokes to distribute and separate) I do a slight cat-eyed eyeliner so this mascara is great for glam drama if can separate lashes well enough during 2nd coat.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is a FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is a FAKE. I have been using this mascara for years. Picture shows the tube I had vs the second one I reciveved from Amazon. Both tubes I received from Amazon were not functional. The wand came out completely full of mascara, there was no narrow part to squeeze off the excess. It also looks different than the ones I get from CVS, I would not recommend. I initially got a replacement, but it was exactly the same. Now I have to go to the UPS to return it. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great volume
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try since they stopped making the original Volum’ Express mascara that I loved. I like the wand and how easy it is to apply and wash off. It makes excellent volume, I get compliments on my eye lashes a lot (which are real). However, the formula used to smudge/flake in really hot weather, but since I’ve bought it a couple more times it stopped. Overall, its one of my favorite mascaras & the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect for being in he pool/ocean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a vacation to Mexico. Was perfect for being in he pool/ocean. It stayed on great! Almost too great..really had to scrub at my eyes to get it off at night, but I'm fine with that if it means I don't have runny mascara raccoon eyes all day!
customer_reviews.author: DBa

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: The mascara I received isn’t real Maybelline Mascara. The color of the tube is a different shade of yellow, it doesn’t say the same thing on the front, and it’s missing the part that scrapes off excess mascara so it comes out way too clumpy. The super low price was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Penington

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara BUT NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be waterproof. Went to the pool today and applied this mascara. I LOVE the length and volume it provides my short, thin Asian lashes however, waterproof, it is NOT!! I didn’t even go under water. Just waded through the pool watching my kids and still, raccoon eyes. Same results with my regular mascara. Not returnable so I’m out the money. On to find a different one with better results. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Lyla Egitto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara when i buy it in the store, but this product was wet and sticky. It never thickens my lashes and is smeary and gross. I think they are really old.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C

customer_reviews.title: Dry. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The mascaras I received were dry. When I used them I felt and saw tiny flakes fall on my face and into my eyeballs🤦🏽. Over a short amount of time an half hour or so in my water lines on my eyes were feeling dry. It was uncomfortable. I diluted the mascaras so I could still make use of them but my lashes don't come out how I want them and it takes longer than my other mascaras to dry because it had to be diluted. I won't buy my mascara from here again. I believe that what I received had to have been old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece to scrape excess made this a mess. Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to give this 0 stars so I gave it one. I’ve bought this before from CVS and had no problem so instead of making an extra trip this week, I figured I’d ordered on Prime. There’s a piece of plastic missing that helps to scrape off excess mascara from the wand. As you can see in the pictures, all the mascara came out when I twisted it open. It’s so messy I threw the whole thing away. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Marie Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Either Different Formula or a Knock Off...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara when I buy it from the store...but it seems like a totally different product when I get it from Amazon. It's thin, rubs off as I blink and smell different. They have a changed their formula--I want to buy it from Walgreens and compare.
customer_reviews.author: ToShop

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: The waterproof version of this product is truly waterproof. You can't wash it off with just soap and water, either. I have to use an oil-based eye-makeup remover. I found that Palmer's bran vitamin E moisturizing oil works fabulously to remove this mascara with ease. I don't contribute to wrinkles by rubbing at my eyes with a acidic or harsh makeup remover. Palmers oil is the best. Just wet a wash cloth with hot water after you take off your make up with Palmers oil, and wipe your eyes to remove excess oil. It is actually good for wrinkles around your eyes to use a Vit E oil to remove makeup. It doesn't dry out your skin.
customer_reviews.author: kindle10.1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Don't Buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Three stars for the Amazon version, not for the actual product. When I buy this mascara in stores, it is fresh and good quality, and I couldn't be happier with it (though it does smudge very easily when wet, if you touch it). But from Amazon, I get very old, already partially dried out mascara every time. This has consistently happened any time I buy beauty or hygiene products from Amazon, to the point where I no longer order them online. Consider doing the same for yourself - it's not worth the lower price you pay here.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a good product not anymore. I remember when I first bought it it would only take one or 2 tries for the eyelashes to look great. Now it takes 3 to 4 times tries to finally get the eyelashes looking good. It still makes the eyelashes look long which I love and its a water proof mascara it takes a while to come off and its a a little hard.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lashes with no clumping
customer_reviews.text: This mascara gives you full coverage without the clumps. I’m on my feet all day running up and down stairs, in very hot conditions. This mascara does not smear or run, it stays on longer than my job. When I get home at night and take it off, just as much comes off as I put on earlier that day.
customer_reviews.author: Intellighter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for cheap volume
customer_reviews.text: I swear without mascara I look like I don't have eye lashes at all. I use this mostly on a day to day basis, but if I were going out, I would use something else. If my eyes water even the slightest bit then the mascara comes off on my eye lid and I look like a weirdo. I know it's washable and not waterproof, but I didn't expect a drop of water to be able to take it off. Still keeping it 5 stars because technically it does what it's says it does. I don't rip out my lashes trying to get it off, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Defected Item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mascara and received a defected product. When you pull out the applicator, there is nothing inside of the tube to wipe off the access liquid product so it comes out in a huge blob to where you could hardly see the bristles. There was no way to salvage the product, ended up just tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth a.

customer_reviews.title: Substandard - Not Waterproof/Doesn't Volumize
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Absolutely no smudge or waterproof. After a few minutes of sweating I had raccoon eyes. The mascara itself is thin. Gives lashes some length but absolutely no volume. Given that my lashes are short and thin, my expectations aren't all that high. This product doesn't even come close to meeting those low expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some “drugstore” brands are superior to their more expensive counterparts
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought everyone who wears mascara has a tube of the yellow. It’s like how everyone knows Cerave must be the kind in the jar, no exceptions! This mascara performs consistently across the board and has for years. Many designer brands have tried to usurp Maybelline’s colossal yellow and few have compared. It’s fun to use all kinds of makeup and try all kinds of looks, but this is everybody’s comfort makeup lol. You just always know it’s going to do you right, with no nasty surprises. Totally worth at least trying.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martini

customer_reviews.title: My every-day mascara/ good for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: It's my every day, go-to mascara! I've gone through at least 20 different brands/types of mascara in my life and this one is one of my favorites! Pros: - Price (duh!) - Looks great and extends length and volume of eyelashes like no other! (Without going over-the-top. i.e good for any occasion) - I haven't had any issues with skin irritation or difficulty in removing this mascara Cons: - None that I've experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the best
customer_reviews.text: If there is one thing Maybelline does well it is mascara. This particular version gives me thick volume that lasts all day without flaking. I happen to prefer a straight applicator over a curved wand (easier to control when doing my "opposite" eye) so this has become my go-to mascara. It applies easily - one coat is usually enough for thick, full lashes - and removes with cleanser or beauty wipes. I have tried so many mascaras, including the pricey department store versions, and this is the one I keep coming back to. No need to pay more for beautiful lashes - save the money for other beauty splurges.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Gasoline/chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have bought different versions of this mascara so many times at my local drug store, so when I bought this here on amazon I thought it would be great, and the prices was comparable to the drug store price. But in reality when I received this mascara I couldn’t put it on my eyelashes. It had a TERRIBLE smell, chemically/gasoline smell to it, I couldn’t image putting it anywhere near my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiti

customer_reviews.title: Careful if you wear contacts-does give good volume!
customer_reviews.text: I like this Mascara. I was wanting to find an organic, waterproof mascara that scored well on the Think Dirty app and this had a decent score while also being a good price. For contact wearers, you will probably want to put your contacts on after as it will stick to your contacts and never leave no matter how hard you try to clean them. It is a bit hard to clean off of my lashes too but I just put coconut oil on them and let it soak for a few seconds before wiping it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kendel Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Wear Again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara for a cruise because I did not want to wear any thick makeup on the ship in the boiling heat. I heard this was the best water-proof mascara and I was honestly very disappointed. Maybe it is because I already have pretty naturally dark lashes, but this did almost nothing for me. I couldn't even tell I was wearing it. Zero volume. Also, it is waterproof? While it did not come off from me sweating, it definitely did not last me being in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mascara for years and love it - I’m giving it one star because my latest subscribe and save order of it is NOT Maybelline. At first I thought it was just a defective tube but upon further inspection, there are small inconsistencies that lead me to conclude this is a dupe. Total unusable garbage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, separates lashes with no clumps!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mascara! It separates the lashes and goes on well. No clumps, which is great! The black is dark enough, you almost don’t need a second coat (especially if you’re looking for a more natural look). A second coat really makes your lashes fuller and very pretty. I noticed it does have a little bit of a scent to it. It’s not bad, but for sensitive eyes, noses, you may notice it applying it, but once it’s dry, you don’t notice it anymore. Definitely recommend this! Just really love that it separates the lashes so well, appear fuller and no awful clumping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Nice mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't totally sure about this product at first, but after using it and off the last six months, it's recently become my go-to. My holy grail mascara has always been L'Oréal Voluminous, but I've noticed this formula looks every bit as good, doesn't bleed/smear under the eye as much, and is easier to remove at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: My favorite drug store mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I have repurchased this mascara multiple times. It has been my go-to drugstore mascara for about a year now. You have to buy a new one every three months they can get old and not work as good. I love this mascara because it is buildable usually two coats and my eyelashes look amazing. Try this if you are looking for a good mascara but dont want to pay a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud💟Guess

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. The more you add, the better it looks. This is after a few coats. It does flake some when you add multiple coats, so that's why I'm only giving it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rebelle Rose

customer_reviews.title: New tube design unusable / best mascara formula ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mascara for 15 years—the formula is perfect; it’s the only drugstore product I keep on hand; but the new bottle design? I’ve ordered two in the last few weeks, both with a broken or missing suction seal, so totally unusable. Help Maybelline!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will only use this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara!!! I used to buy the same two drugstore mascaras and would layer them on to get LONG and thick lashes. This alone has replaced the two and does the job even better! Makes them super long, not clumpy, comes off easy, and three coats gets you stunning lashes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people who are always on the move
customer_reviews.text: I've always struggled with finding a mascara that doesn't fade, irritate, or end up underneath my eyes during my busy workdays. This mascara is the answer to that problem. It's got the "old school" style wand that I love, too. I can't say anything bad about this mascara. I feel like I should stick up on it in case it ever gets discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Drama lashes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara out there. I get asked all the time on what I use for mascara and this is my secret. I love the volume it gives. I don't have thick eyelashes but this makes them pop and lengthen then.
customer_reviews.author: JULIET R

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Volume
customer_reviews.text: This mascara adds lots of volume, which is awesome. And the color is very black, which is what I was going for. I would give 5 stars, but it clumps a little bit when you apply it. I wouldn't mind too much for going out to the bar or something, but I try to be very, very careful when applying the mascara before work to avoid clumps. (Having said this, my husband doesn't seem to notice whenever there are clumps. He think I look really nice with this mascara. So it's likely a matter of preference)
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!!! such a great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality, doesn't lump my eyelashes unless I don't apply it fast and in one direction. I decided to stop overspending over mascaras as this one does the job perfectly and the price is AMAZING. Honestly, after buying high-end mascaras and this one, the difference is very minor. I love it and will surely be back for more from now on. if you are hesitant don't be, go for it and get it. it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ema N

customer_reviews.title: Big volume however does smear a bit on my upper eyelids
customer_reviews.text: Gives me huge, full lashes. Been using this for many, many years. Volumizing brush, I use the waterproof formula after I curl mine. The non-waterproof doesn't seem to hold the curl as well. This mascara does smear on upper eyelid though, however for the price it's my go to. Remove with oil or waterproof mascara removing solution only. Takes some time however I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: SmoothOperator2011

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Maybelline mascara since 7th or 8th grade. Personally, I think it's better than $10, $20 mascaras I have tried from Ipsy. I don't experience any flaking and of the 3 other mascaras I've tried from Maybelline, I think this does the best with volume. I will keep buying it until their price exceeds $10 or they stop making it. Easy to put on, don't really experience clumps (but the current container is still pretty new).
customer_reviews.author: PeepsAndTreats

customer_reviews.title: Loved the brush, no smuging
customer_reviews.text: I actually received a sample and then bought it right away. Yep, the point of a sample. It worked. I have gone though a ton of mascara brands in my day and always come back to L'Oreal Voluminous This mascara is a tie for me. I like the brush better on this one. It seperates lashes better. I didn't find that it smugged or it would be a goner. It stayed all day, my lashes were Colossal! It washed off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara of all time
customer_reviews.text: Every year or so I get the itch to try a new mascara, and every time I go back to this one without finishing out the new tube. It comes off easily, doesn't clump, and can be layered for more dramatic or everyday wear. The brush is very user friendly and has a great tip to the end for catching the lashes at the end of your eye and by your tear duct. I hope they keep making this stuff forever.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try something new, different and see if I could get a different look. Nope...just highly disappointed. First of all this mascara stinks like in smell it stinks and the smell stays with you all day. Second it is very easy to get off because it doesn't really coat like it says and as for volume....well what a disappointment. I have long lashes anyway but this made them look smaller then they are. With out mascara my eye lashes almost hit my eyebrows with mascara my lashes look fake but not with this product. I will not be buying this again that is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not the "volume express" formula
customer_reviews.text: I have re-ordered this product several times and loved it, but this last time it was not the same formula. Unfortunately I didn't notice until after I had opened and applied it but it is not the "volume express" formula and does not add the volume or length I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the volume and length i get with this product. The wand is great, I dont even need to curl my lashes prior to get a nice noticable lash. I haven't found it to be clumpy or flaky throughout the day and it lasts me quite a while. It removes easily at the end of the day. I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Luckiecharms

customer_reviews.title: While I like the way that it goes on and looks
customer_reviews.text: While I like the way that it goes on and looks, it smells terrible and for that alone I won't reorder. Has anyone else had this issue? every time I open it, it is very strong and unpleasant. Once the air dries it, the smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the brush at all! It isn't full like the one I usually use (Maybelline Rocket Volum Express). The mascara clumps in between the brushes and I find that they were horrible for my bottom lashes. I ended up buying my usual one after trying this one for 3 days. The brush is firm unlike some new ones where the brushes are flimsy so that was about the only thing I liked about it.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglandGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was going to be in and out of the water on a trip. Terribly disappointing that this was not waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pass By This one
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, offensive odor when applying. The odor goes away once the mascara dries. Lasts only a few hours, then I look in the mirror and see that it has started flaking off. This happened each day shortly after noon. I have used Maybelline mascaras for years but I don’t recommend this particular mascara, at all!
customer_reviews.author: FencePpl

customer_reviews.title: So you want mascara huh?
customer_reviews.text: Day 4: rations running thin. Our encampment holds strong. So does this mascara. Attempted to remove. Cried, washed my face, coconut oil... barely makes a dent. This mascara will live on longer than I will. I will die before this mascara quits. This mascara is now my curse. VIVA LA MASCARA
customer_reviews.author: Lady Christina K., RVT

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for years and will never stop!!
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara ever and I get a lot of compliments on my lashes!!! Buy it in bulk and don’t go another day without having this on hand for work or a night out.. the waterproof version is great too and you will need mascara remover to get it off.. doesn’t clump up and keeps lashes lush and long!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive mascara, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: During my makeup routine I use a variety of mascaras to cover the different bases of what I want to accomplish with my eye look. My eyes are big and I like to make them stand out. This one however makes them stand out in a way no other mascara has! If you are looking for a more dramatic and beautiful look this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Lasts in the water, but does not create volume
customer_reviews.text: It dries very quickly and applying multiple layers is not easy. However, it lasted in the water all day and I had no issues removing the mascara with wet makeup wipes. I wish it would create more volume, but it is not possible as it dries out lashes and I could not do more than three coats.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Buratino

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am a make up artist and this is my "go to" mascara. Excellent customer service, shipping, value, and product. This mascara really stays on during photo shoots even in "high, hot lighting" on me and for other models. I wore this for my wedding and use it for weddings when I do the make up.
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mascara brand and color (very black) for at least 5 years. I get constant compliments and people tend to think I'm wearing false lashes. I have no need to buy a more expensive mascara because this one works beautifully. If you've never tried it before, be prepared. It will change your makeup game for the better. No clumps, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Smudges
customer_reviews.text: Easily clumps and leaves raccoon eyes by the end of the day. Not recommended for night out or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Parson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on Dr. Drey recommendation. I hate the wand. The handle is short and think and feels clumsy. It is challenging to reach all my lashes. It only adds minimal volume to my lashes. I have to be careful which makeup I pair it with as it runs terribly with some. The only good thing is that its not clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good for day to day routine
customer_reviews.text: I've tried tons of different mascaras over the years and this one has become my go-to. I don't use a lot of makeup and I already have long lashes, so this mascara works out pretty well for me. It can be a little messy (I use makeup remover on a Qtip to clean up any residue) but it isn't very clumpy on my lashes. It does stay on pretty well and is one of the cheapest ones you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the mascaras that I use, I love this because it goes on smooth, is not clumpy, does not have a smell like some I have tried, does not sting my eyes, smoothly coats my lashes without a lot of fibers so for me its perfect. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: readingisfun

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It's got a fat brush which makes application easy and fast. It gives your lashes a full fan look, and adds amazing length and thickness. The waterproof formula stays on all day. It comes off fairly easily with waterproof makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Mascara came missing the "middle section" of the container where the brush rubs off the extra mascara so you can easily apply it without being gloopy. Opened the bottle and it was a huge blob of black pouring out. Can't even use the mascara and threw it out. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and sloppy
customer_reviews.text: It’s too messy for me. The tip is bulky and sloppy. I still haven’t been able to apply it without smudging or avoiding clumps. The “Rocket” worked much better for me. I’ll continue to use the “Colossal” once in a while, only so I don’t feel it was such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: I love the mascara, and would have loved it more if the wand wasn't mangled beyond belief. I had to pull as hard as possible to get it out of the tube. It was bent and twisted at hard angles. Thankfully I still had the last tube of mascara, which was identical, so I could use the wand from that one in this new one.
customer_reviews.author: magentafreak

customer_reviews.title: Eh dried out and just no
customer_reviews.text: Super dried out ...mistake where made should have just went to target also a nightmare to remove
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for vacation. I wore it out to DINNER and it actually smeared and ran worse than any other “non waterproof” mascara I have ever used! Nonstop burning in my eyes for 45 mins and I didn’t even get it wet! Straight to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Natural Long Lashes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mascara that could give me long, not too clumpy, lashes for a more natural look and this is it! Only down side is that it bothers my eyes a little and sometimes mascara flakes will fall off. It's also a little harder to wash off than what I'm used to but overall it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: E & D

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: There was no internal tube. Product was defective and I am returning
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rutland

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as usual.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Black Friday for an extremely low price. Unfortunately this bottle was not the quality I usually see. Clumpy, dry already, and I am already to the point of throwing it away (only 20 days later and I don’t wear mascara everyday) Not at all like the ones I have bought in store (I have bought this specific mascara many many times in the drug store).
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Lashes at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Maybelline mascara. These were a great value (much cheaper on Amazon than the drugstore), and I have even more fun applying to my lashes. I make my lashes bigger and thicker than ever with this product! I always open two at a time and alternate use.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara comes out of this yellow container like sparkling water out of a bottle. Unfortunately, it’s impossible to apply this mascara on lashes because this black substance overflows them. So my eye makeup resembles a witch’s face - typical fatty fly’s legs on my face. Beware !! - because contacting this seller is like looking for an Easter bunny during Christmas time!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Millette

customer_reviews.title: Mascara runs under eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten better coverage with other drug store brands. I didn't like the formula and thought it didn't give me enough coverage. I ended up using it a couple of times and stopped. Also, other mascaras don't run under my eyes by the end of the day but this one did.
customer_reviews.author: Haute Air Boerne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are a pretty good value. I find that it does clump after a while, but at that point, I usually just toss & open a new tube- for the price saved against other comparable mascaras, I find that it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Crickle

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance filled
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Maybelline mascara. I thought I would try a different style. This mascara has a fragrance to it and gave me a headache and made my eyes all red. I won't be using this again. I wouldn't recommend it if you have sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: momathome-123

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Product is not at all waterproof. I had raccoon eyes within 2 hours of the application. I gave it a shot 3 or 4 days in a row in combination with different eyeliners and solo- the mascara only and no other eye products. It still ran. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: best mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: this is the best mascara ever and i have tried them all, great price also, its soft and not sticky, last all day, makes my lashes look fabulous and easy to remove. just a great product all around! i highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, goes on smoothly and is a good price. I prefer the washable mascara because it comes off with a little soap and warm water without getting a makeup remover in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: What test panel of idiots thought it needed perfume?
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lashes look good, but who the heck needs that much (or any) perfume in their eye makeup?!? Excuse me, good sir, but I’d like to not only look fabulous, but also hide the offensive reek from my eyeballs behind the overwhelming aroma of roses... Gives me a headache. Make it unscented and I’d buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite mascaras. I like that it came in a two pack. This stays on well but doesn’t require anything special to remove it when cleaning my make-up off at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Product has turned to crap in the last year.
customer_reviews.text: As an exclusive user of this product for the last few years, (because I love the brush and how it applies) I can honestly say this product has turned to shit in the last year. I don’t know what changed, but you’d think I would get more than 5 uses out of the tube before it dries up and gets all gross. I use this product every day, so 5 uses is unacceptable. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Shanel

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes and I hate wearing mascara that would be a pain to remove. This one comes off easy. Even on the days that I forget to remove it. I dont wake up with a black looking eye. My new Fav!
customer_reviews.author: Olma

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is one of the best cheap ones! My lashes are a moderate length but this really boost them up. But I don't find it very water resisitant, because i always tend to end up as a racoon no matter what mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi bella

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite mascara but still good
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a waterproof mascara. It does seem to flake off during the day a little that I have to keep wiping off from under my eyes so that it doesn't look like I have 2 black eyes. I also have to use a soapy washcloth to scrub it off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra W.

customer_reviews.title: My Fave
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner everrrrr. It makes my lashes sooo thick and long, people always ask me if I'm wearing false lashes. Love the fact that they extend my natural lashes so beautifully. The only thing I will say I don't like is that after a while, some of the mascara may fall into your eyes, so watch for that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice, thinking the first time was a fluke. Both times the insert in the mascara was missing, so the wand had a big glob of mascara on it. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: There is no rim in the bottle to remove the excess product from the brush. It's literally unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Clark

customer_reviews.title: My go to mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to mascara for years. It’s inexpensive and doesn’t clump. I get beautiful long eyelashes with it. When your eyelashes do start to clump then you know it’s time to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a big brush, which is good for volume on upper lashes. You'll need a good waterproof mascara remover, though (I use Almay)--this is not a "removes with soap and water" product. But it lasts well and doesn't flake or clump.
customer_reviews.author: E. Goodling

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper price than at the drug store!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite mascaras (I have been wearing it for over 8 years now) and I'm glad I was able to find it for a cheaper price than at the drug store on Amazon! 5/5 stars from me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is...Ok. Nothing spectacular, you can definitely find a better product out there for a few more dollars. I used it twice and threw it in the trash. I love L'oreal Paradise - try it!
customer_reviews.author: Holli E.

customer_reviews.title: This is art project accessory rather than a mascara for eyes!
customer_reviews.text: The only think you can posit with it are canvas, but not you're leashed. I bought 2 mascaras. When I first open it up, the brush was completely soaked. I opened the other one - same result. See the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Zorro

customer_reviews.title: Not real or super old
customer_reviews.text: I have used only maybeline mascara since I’ve started wearing make up because it’s the best I’ve ever used for volume and length but this is not the real one or its that old. I got no volume and it was so wet that even with curling I couldn’t get any length. It also flakes very bad and I have never had that issue with this mascara when I buy it from the store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to drug store mascara. I like the wand a lot. It is not water proof. But I tend to find that water proof mascara just doesn’t have the same consistency and applies differently than regular mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Newell

customer_reviews.title: One of the best mascaras
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best mascaras and mascara wands I've used. Not very clumpy, nor does it give you the "spider web" look, but also not too thin and runny. Thickens and spreads eyelashes well and dries quickly so no blink-smearing!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get it off!! But, I was looking for waterproof! That part is for sure! It just asked for the star rating on the easy to remove part... I hated to give it less stars because it is a great product, but it is not east to remove!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It is waterproof but it certainly isn't as nice looking as my mascara I generally use. Doesn't look striking or voluminous. Pretty run of the mill. I'll use this but will never buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Gave me racoon eyes and not in a good way. And yet when I washed it off ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the other glowing reviews, I found this mascara to be awful. Took forever to dry and smudged all over. Gave me racoon eyes and not in a good way. And yet when I washed it off it never came of completely even with eye makeup remover so my pillow case had mascara smears every morning. Although I hate to waste products I ended up throwing it out and getting a normal mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes a little clumpy but pretty amazing otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this mascara. It really bulks up the volume of your lashes with minimal effort. The color is as black as I expected, it has a fat wand that gives a lot of coverage, and it lasts all day. I didn't experience any running or irritation. The only issue with it is that it can sometimes go on a little clumpy during application but I work it out by smoothing it over with the wand a few times until the clumps are removed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this exact product at Walgreens and never had a problem. But when I got this order delivered, it seems to be crap. Definitely not waterproof. Don't understand why it would be any different than the other tubes I have bought, but highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Raab

customer_reviews.title: Adds good length.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my go-to mascara, but it started to be very flakey and would bleed under my eyes. I always looked tired so I switched to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I got this product in the mail and when I opened it most of the mascara came out of the tube and clumped together. When I managed to clean it up I had practically nothing left to use. Applying it was awful as well it continued to clump and when I removed it with a make up remover wipe it took some eye lashes out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a brush,messy clumps
customer_reviews.text: Yall this mascara is so messy. The brush isnt really a brush. I opened this mascara yesterday for first time and a huge clump came out,was all over brush.rediculous.do not buy
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a month..it cakes and clumps, flakes off (while it is being applied), very difficult to remove (always wake up next morning with raccoon eye). In the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pat P

customer_reviews.title: Does not flake
customer_reviews.text: I like the mascara as it does not flake, it is waterproof and long lasting. It is a bit hard to remove even if you use the makeup wipes. I guess it is consolation for not having runny mascara that gives you raccoon eyes :)
customer_reviews.author: Oyanish

product_meta.title: Maybelline Volum' Express The Colossal Waterproof Mascara Makeup, Volumizing No Clump Mascara, Glam Black, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 2| Color:Glam blackColossal lashes in just one go! The volume-plumping formula contains collagen and the Mega Brush instantly achieves 9X the volume, all without any clumps. Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for contact lens wearers.
feature_bullets: Volume-plumping formula infused with collagen guarantees a no-clump volumized look and was ophtalmologist tested
Volum' Express The Colossal Volumizing Mascara features the Mega Brush to instantly achieve 9 times the volume
Washable lengthening and volumizing mascara is designed to give you the dramatic eye makeup look you dream of
Volum' Express The Colossal Washable Mascara is available in 2 super-saturated shades- Glam Black and Classic Black
Volum' Express The Colossal Washable Mascara is absolutely suitable for all contact lens wearers to use

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
